name: Delivery Driver- Project
description:
Working through GamDev.tv's projects and getting my feet wet with coding and Unity. 

https://www.gamedev.tv/p/unity-2d-game-dev-course-2021/?coupon_code=AUTUMN

WASD controls the cars movement  

Object of the game is to collect the Green Boxes (Packages) and deliver them to the Pink Triangle (client). Your car turns green when you have a package ready to deliver.

Orange Dots scattered around the map will give you a speed boost, but be careful! Colliding with any object will reduce your speed until you either pick-up a new package, deliver to the client, or find another boost.

Enjoy this little game, I had a lot of fun building it.  :)
